All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionChat
    This action allows the player to chat with a character.
    ActionDrop
    Action that drops an item from the inventory to the current area.
    ActionExits
    The action that shows the exits of the current area.
    ActionGo
    The action that allows the player to move to another area.
    ActionHelp
    The action that displays the help.
    ActionInventory
    The action that prints the items in player's inventory.
    ActionInvestigate
    The action that allows the player to investigate an item.
    ActionLookAround
    The action that allows the player to look around the area.
    ActionMurderer
    The action sets the player's suspect of the murder.
    ActionNote
    The action adds a note to the notepad.
    ActionPick
    The action picks up an item from the current area and puts it into the inventory.
    ActionReadNotes
    The action returns the notes from the notepad.
    ActionTerminate
    The action quits the game.
    ActionUnlock
    The action unlocks the area in the given direction.
    Area
    The type Area.
    Character
    The type Character.
    CharDetective
    The type for detective character.
    CharJacob
    The type Character Jacob.
    CharJoni
    The type for Character Joni.
    CharLinda
    The type for Character Linda.
    CharMarta
    The type for Character Marta.
    CharMeg
    The type for Character Meg.
    CharRansom
    The type for Character Ransom.
    CharRichard
    The type for Character Richard.
    CharWalter
    The type for Character Walter.
    Game
    The main type of the game.
    GameState
    The enum represents the possible game states (playing, won, lost).
    GameWorld
    This class represents the game world - all the areas in the game.
    IAction
    The interface defines methods necessary for implementation of game command.
    ICharacter
    The interface defines methods necessary for implementation of game character.
    Inventory
    Class represents inventory of the player.
    Item
    Represents an item in the game.
    ItemVials
    Represents vials item.
    Main  
    RemoveEndComma
    A utility class for removing end comma from a string.
    TextUI
    Represents text user interface of the game.
